ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lots-o-questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: Bought mine for 4.5kpp on Tarew Marr.  The shield is a 9 pt shield that doesn t stack with thorn type shields, but still stacks with ours.  It lasts about 5
ygData.messageBody:
Bought mine for 4.5kpp on Tarew Marr. The shield is a 9 pt shield that doesn't stack with thorn type shields, but still stacks with ours. It lasts about 5 minutes (about a fight and a half : ), and has about a 5 second casting time.

Something I've noticed on Bards and using items....'cause we're bards we can activate items while moving etc, but I can't find a way for us to interupt the casting on an item (the others in my guild just move, crouch, or sit and it interrupts them...but none of those work for us).

Also, for laughs, go out to third person sometime, and activate an illusion mask, then duck while it's still casting. You'll get a very interesting look :)

--Khelan

>>> Robert(Bob) Smith<rws1111@...> 01/15/01 08:52AM >>>
#2) I have been thinking about trying to get a SS bracer, but really
do not want to put the time in the camp. EQ Prices has them listed in
the 2K-2.5K range, but a couple of my friends kinda laughed and said
I would be looking in the 10K-15K range┬à what is the price of the
bracer, and how good are they? (BTW, this is on Xegony.)
